page.title: 13BURTON SALMON SCHOOL LIFE 3
page.content:
GAMES
At school we play many different games. The boys like to play football or cricket in the playground. The girls like to play rounders or tennis. Chasing games are very popular too. We have found a new game called netball-rounders. When you bat you try and hit the ball away from the fielders and then run around the court. The other team have to try and return the ball and put it into the netball goalnet before you can run to the homebase. Off the ground tig is fun. You have to try and tig someone when they are on the ground. They can only stay on the wall or steps or drainpipes etc. for a few seconds before changing position.
